dt: {bc}a wide-brimmed double felt sun hat worn especially in subtropical regions

et: by ellipsis from {it}Terai hat,{/it} after {it}Terai, Tarai{/it} (Hindi {it}Tarāī,{/it} Nepali {it}Taraī{/it}), grassland and marsh belt between the Himalayan foothills and the plains of the Indus and Ganges
